nodes.bodyText:
Instead of making this a BiPredicate, could we make it a Predicate which would allow use to make use of the existing Koryphe Functions and Predicates?
The second adminUser argument could be a class field of the predicate as it's unlikely to change.

+@JsonTypeInfo(use = JsonTypeInfo.Id.CLASS, property = "class")
+public abstract class AccessPredicate implements BiPredicate<User, String>, Serializable {

nodes.bodyText: I don't know whether the CI caught it but could you add a licence header for this file?
